r.s: Determine and list how much filespace each installed package consumes.
r.d: A commandline tool modeled on the Unix 'df' that lists how much filespace each installed package consumes. A subset of packages can be specified as can channels.
r.n: * Fix Bug #14764: html output is ugly [kguest] * Fix Bug #14975: Unit test failures - 'Killzero' isn't rendered [kguest] * Implement Feature #14748: option to not display zero lines in verbose mode [kguest]
